CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Echo strength – how much of the past bleeds into the present frame
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_strength

CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_zoom

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Echo spin – twist your visual memories as they fade into the void

CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_min

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Highlight tint – paint the brightest echoes with brilliant colors
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_max

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Media opacity – fade your visuals from ghostly transparent to boldly solid.
